Other noble ancestors include Margaret Kerdeston, granddaughter of Michael de la Pole, 2nd Earl of Suffolk; Robert Devereux, 2nd Earl of Essex, an English nobleman and a favourite of Elizabeth I of England; and Edward Seymour, 1st Duke of Somerset, a descendant of his brother James II of England through his brother James II of England's son Lionel of Antwerp, 1st Duke of Clarence. [0]'s Scottish roots came from [0]'s maternal grandmother, Lady Fermoy. Work from Ohio, who was married to [0]'s great-grandfather James Roche, 3rd Baron Fermoy, an Irish peer. Diana's fourth great-grandmother in her direct maternal line, Eliza Kewark, was matrilineally of Indian descent.
